page.title: 13INTERVIEW WITH LIBRARIAN.
page.content: {1, HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN A LIBRARIAN? ONLY ONE YEAR. {2, WHAT QUALIFACATIONS DO YOU NEED TO {BE A LIBRARIAN ? I NEED O'LEVELS, A'LEVELS AND A LIBRARY DEGREE. {3, HOW MUCH DO SPEND ON BOOKS A YEAR ? JUST UNDER Â£2OOO A YEAR. {4, WHAT SORT OF BOOKS DO YOU HAVE ? FICTION, SENIOR FICTION, NON FICTION, ENCYLOPAECLICIS, MAPS, NEWSPAPERS AND MAGAZINES. {5, ABOUT HOW MANY BOOKS DO YOU HAVE ? WE HAVE 11,OOO. {6, DO YOU LIKE WORKING AS A LIBRARIAN? {WHY ? YES I LIKE HELPING YOU IN EDUCATION, I LIKE TEACHING FIRST YEARS. {7, IS IT EASY TO GET A JOB AS A {LIBRARIAN ? WHY ?
